funcs.name: xmlwriter_open_memory
funcs.desc: Creates a new XMLWriter using memory for string output.

return.desc:
Object oriented style: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

Procedural style: Returns a new xmlwriter resource for later use with the xmlwriter functions on success, FALSE on error.

funcs.name: xmlwriter_open_uri
funcs.desc: Creates a new XMLWriter using uri for the output.

return.desc:
Object oriented style: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

Procedural style: Returns a new xmlwriter resource for later use with the xmlwriter functions on success, FALSE on error.

args.name: uri
args.desc: The URI of the resource for the output.

funcs.name: xmlwriter_set_indent_string
funcs.desc: Sets the string which will be used to indent each element/attribute of the resulting xml.

return.desc: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

args.name: xmlwriter
args.desc: Only for procedural calls. The XMLWriter resource that is being modified. This resource comes from a call to xmlwriter_open_uri() or xmlwriter_open_memory().

args.name: indentstring
args.desc: The indentation string.

return.desc: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

args.name: version
args.desc: The version number of the document as part of the XML declaration. Defaults to 1.0.

args.name: encoding
args.desc: The encoding of the document as part of the XML declaration. NULL by default.

args.name: standalone
args.desc: yes or no.

funcs.desc: Ends the DTD of the document.

args.name: xmlwriter
args.desc: Only for procedural calls. The XMLWriter resource that is being modified. This resource comes from a call to xmlwriter_open_uri() or xmlwriter_open_memory().

return.desc: If you opened the writer in memory, this function returns the generated XML buffer, Else, if using URI, this function will write the buffer and return the number of written bytes.

args.name: xmlwriter
args.desc: Only for procedural calls. The XMLWriter resource that is being modified. This resource comes from a call to xmlwriter_open_uri() or xmlwriter_open_memory().

args.name: empty
args.desc: Whether to empty the buffer or no. Default is TRUE.

return.desc: Returns the current buffer as a string.

args.name: xmlwriter
args.desc: Only for procedural calls. The XMLWriter resource that is being modified. This resource comes from a call to xmlwriter_open_uri() or xmlwriter_open_memory().

args.name: flush
args.desc: Whether to flush the output buffer or no. Default is TRUE.
